description: Try our easy to follow Tim Tam Slam BBQ Hot Cross Bun recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Tim Tam Slam BBQ Hot Cross Bun
name: Tim Tam Slam BBQ Hot Cross Bun Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add a pinch of salt to melted chocolate and stir to combine. Place top half of buns on berries, then drizzle with melted chocolate and sprinkle over crushed biscuits.
